name: Coloring Book Free
description:
Coloring Book Free is a fun new coloring activity for all ages. Choose from a wide variety of drawing tools and bright colors to unleash your creativity. Use one of 30 hand drawn coloring pages and add as much detail as you want, or start from the clean canvas and let your imagination run wild! Keep your child busy with a positive activity that fits right into the palm of their hand. Coloring Book Free is easy to pickup and play for both kids and adults. This is one iPhone and iPad app the whole family will be sure to enjoy.

Features:
• 60 hand drawn pictures to color
• Blank canvas to create your own masterpiece
• 8 different drawing and painting tools
• 70 colors available for iPad
• 40 colors available for iPhone
• Helps to develop hand eye coordination
• Save pictures to photo library for easy sharing or to use as wallpaper
• Automatically saves works in progress
• Easy to clear coloring page and start over
• Brush size and hardness are easy to adjust
• Kid tested and approved
